QuestData.Title: The Burning Throne
QuestData.Description: The time has come, $n, to begin our assault upon Antorus. Everything we have fought for, everything our friends and family have sacrificed, has brought us to this moment.$b$bWe will fire Light's Judgment upon the walls of the accursed citadel and storm their seat of power. We will end the Legion.$b$bAfter all you have done, it is fitting that you have the honor. Activate the Crown of the Triumvirate and let us finish our mission.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Crown of the Triumvirate while above the Antoran Wastes to open the way to Antorus.

Objectives.Objective: Crown of the Triumvirate activated above the Antoran Wastes
